Package org.baswell.httproxy

Interface Summary
IOProxyDirector A ProxyDirector for blocking IO.
NIOProxyDirector A ProxyDirector for non-blocking IO.
ProxiedRequest Details about a proxied client request.
ProxiedResponse Details about a proxied server response.
ProxyDirector Base interface for receiving proxy events and manipulating request & response headers.
ProxyLogger Bridge between your logging system and the HttProxy runtime.
WrappedSocketChannel External implementations of an SSL supported SocketChannel should implement this interface so that the real SocketChannel is used to register with the Selector.
 

Class Summary
Header An HTTP header.
ServerSocketAcceptLoop  
ServerSocketChannelAcceptLoop Accepts and dispatches incoming requests on the given ServerSocketChannel.
SimpleIODirector A simple IOProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleNIOProxyDirector A simple NIOProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleProxyDirector A simple ProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
SimpleProxyLogger A ProxyLogger implementation that logs everything to System.out or System.err.
SSLServerSocketChannel A wrapper around a real ServerSocketChannel that produces SSLSocketChannel on SSLServerSocketChannel.accept().
SSLSocketChannel A wrapper around a real SocketChannel that adds SSL support.
 

Exception Summary
EndProxiedRequestException When thrown from NIOProxyDirector.connectToProxiedHost(ProxiedRequest) or IOProxyDirector.connectToProxiedHost(ProxiedRequest) methods the response code will be returned to the client and the connection closed.
